doc.title: The Animated Star-Spangled Banner
doc.plot: As a children's choir sings the first verse of "The Star-Spangled Banner", animated images, humorously related to the words in the song, flash by. Examples: several gallon jugs of milk accompany the word "gallantly"; a rain of hailstones accompanies the word "hailed"; and a Rockettes-style chorus line accompanies the word "rockets'".
